findings.message:
Reentrancy in OlympusBondDepository.deposit(uint256,uint256,address) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#817-872):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(principle).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#847)
	- IERC20(principle).approve(address(treasury),_amount) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#848)
	- ITreasury(treasury).deposit(_amount,principle,profit) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#849)
	- IERC20(OHM).safeTransfer(DAO,fee) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#852)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- BondPriceChanged(bondPriceInUSD(),_bondPrice(),debtRatio()) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#868)
		- terms.minimumPrice = 0 (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#1006)
	- adjust() (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#870)
		- terms.controlVariable = terms.controlVariable.add(adjustment.rate) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#940)
		- terms.controlVariable = terms.controlVariable.sub(adjustment.rate) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#945)
	- totalDebt = totalDebt.add(value) (../..0x956c43998316b6a2f21f89a1539f73fb5b78c151.sol#856)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
